synopsis.text: Will the valiant Sakaki, a formidable female warrior, be able to prove her innocence and escape the clutches of the Grand Chancellor, the absolute ruler residing in the foreboding Hell Castle? Sakaki embarks on a perilous journey, bearing the eye of a vanquished dragon as a token of her courage and strength. However, the Grand Chancellor, who is living in constant fear of a prophecy that foretells his demise at the hands of a ruthless assassin named Kyokotsu, accuses Sakaki of being the very assassin she claims not to be. With guards closing in on her, can Sakaki unveil the true identity of Kyokotsu and clear her name? The fate of our heroine hangs in the balance in this thrilling tale of courage, deception, and determination.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
